Type

The type throughout the webapp uses Googleâ€™s Lato font-family. Various font styles are used throughout the webapp to establish a sense of hierarchy in the content and controls.

  • Blockquote
    The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
    Size: 23px Weight: Light - Italic Letter-Spacing: 0px
